about.description.P1: Perpetua is an integrated software development studio creating beautiful websites, software & applications for our clients and their customers.
about.description.P2: Simplicity, beauty, & attention to detail—these values underpin all that we do, and continue to guide our talented, international team in creating the best software in the world.
about.careers.header: We’re always looking to hire great people—from anywhere in the world—to better serve our clients internationally. Check out our going positions below.
call-action.phrase-L1: We connect great businesses to their customers
contact.title: Get in touch
contact.header-af: talented job seekers—we’d love to hear from you.
contact.header-bf: We’re always keen to connect with great people doing great things.  New clients, old clients, friends, partners
